thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zenitas Healthcare To Acquire Australian Home Care Services

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zenitas Healthcare To Acquire Australian Home Care Services

organizations.name: brief-zenitas healthcare to acquire australian home care services

text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Zenitas Healthcare Ltd:
* AGREEMENTS TO ACQUIRE AUSTRALIAN HOME CARE SERVICES * REAFFIRMS MARKET GUIDANCE FOR FY18 EBITDA OF $13-13.5M PRIOR TO ANNOUNCED ACQUISITIONS
* TO ALSO ACQUIRE BELEURA HEALTH SOLUTIONS * POST ACQUISITIONS, SEES FY18 GROSS REVENUE (PRE CLINICIAN CONTRACTOR PAYMENTS) BASE OF $170M AND EBITDA OF $19.0M ON PROFORMA BASIS
* EXPECTED CASH PRICE OF $4 MILLION FOR AHCS ACQUISITION; ACQUISITION PRICE OF $2.4 MILLION FOR BELEURA ACQUISITION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
